prontera,164,170,3	script	Donates [ROPS]	564,{
mes "[vendinha]";
mes "Olá "+strcharinfo(0)+", qual shop voce deseja ver?";
switch(select("- Donate VIP:- Cartas MVP:- Equipe Cabeça:- Equipe Baixo:- Equipe Meio:- Comidas + 10:- Nada"))
{
  case 1: close2;
  callshop "Donate VIP", 0;
  end;
  case 2: close2;
  callshop "cartas", 0;
  end;
case 3: close2;
  callshop "equip topo", 0;
  end;
case 4: close2;
  callshop "equip baixo", 0;
  end;
case 5: close2;
  callshop "equip meio", 0;
  end;
case 6: close2;
  callshop "Comidas + 10", 0;
  end;
case 7: close;
OnInit:
waitingroom "Donates",0,"",0;
end;
}
}
-	cashshop	Donate VIP	-1,5377:12000,5374:7500,5594:12000,5137:12000,5013:10000,5379:10000,5518:12000,5800:10000,5775:10000,1530:10000,1646:10000,2710:10000,2383:10000,2687:10000,5353:10000,5171:10000,1646:10000,2554:10000,13033:10000,5451:10000,2729:10000,2375:10000,2686:10000,2433:10000,2374:10000,5808:10000,2537:10000,2423:10000,1161:10000,2630:10000,2115:10000,2524:10000,2357:10000,2421:10000,2410:10000,5306:10000,13307:10000
